import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-counter-component', templateUrl: './materias.component.html', styleUrls: ['./materias.commponent.css'] }) export class CounterComponent { public currentCount = 0; public incrementCounter() { this.currentCount++; } }
